name: Humanity's Garden
description:
An input optional screensaver game where you watch humanity's flight from Earth on long haul seed ships! Few will survive, and few will thrive. But even in this cold expanse life may still find a way. Lightyears from where they started a colony may be able to maintain enough of a tech level to create fine household goods in order to spread to the stars with their own ships.

Watch as a map of the nearby habitable worlds builds!
